creator: Perfume Direct
descriptionHtml:
Introducing the Perfume Direct app! Don’t pay through the nose for your favourite perfumes and aftershaves. With the Perfume Direct app, it’s never been easier to buy designer fragrances at great prices, including brands like Hugo Boss, Gucci, Calvin Klein & Dior.

Perfume Direct offer luxury fragrances at affordable prices, allowing you to treat yourself (or someone else) without breaking the bank. Our global network of brands and suppliers mean that we can provide you with the latest fragrances on the market, at the best prices.

With a huge range of fragrances, unlock a world of hassle-free shopping with Perfume Direct. Access fast delivery and free shipping over £30. We have partnered with Klarna, giving customers a Buy Now Pay Later option, and we offer a Perfume Directs Rewards scheme; 1 point for every £1 spent.

We offer a simplified shopping experience across IOS & Android, with Apple Pay and Google Pay available. Take advantage of our scan & search functionality; simply scan a product in a shop and the app will search our online store to see if we have it in stock for you.

Keep up to date with our latest offers through push notifications through the app, and never miss another offer on your favourite fragrances.

With the Perfume Direct app, enjoy these great features:
• Huge range of designer aftershaves at great prices
• Free shipping over £30
• Klarna Buy Now Pay Later option
• Apple & Google Pay
• Scan & search
• Push notifications for all the latest offers

We offer a simplified shopping experience across IOS & Android, with Apple Pay and Google Pay available. Take advantage of our scan & search functionality; simply scan a product in a shop and the app will search our online store to see if we have it in stock for you.

Keep up to date with our latest offers through push notifications through the app, and never miss another offer on your favourite fragrances.

With the Perfume Direct app, enjoy these great features:
• Huge range of designer aftershaves at great prices
• Free shipping over £30
• Klarna Buy Now Pay Later option
• Apple & Google Pay
• Scan & search
• Push notifications for all the latest offers
